We can help you to buy top quality books for your library. We provide an easy and cost effective way to buy books:

  • 9,000 titles to choose from including fiction, non fiction, big books and novelty books to promote reading for pleasure and support the curriculum.
  • A good selection of new titles, selected and assessed by a team of librarians.
  • Booklists to support the literacy and numeracy strategies, raising the achievement of boys and teenage reading.
  • Professional help and advice.
  • Preferential discount.
  • Free servicing (includes plastic wallets, classification number, etc)
  • Direct delivery to school

For more information please contact us using the details above
